Welcome to the MVP Resellers Portal

Welcome to our brand new portal for MVP Resellers!

This is the place where you can find all the information and resources you need to be a full-fledged Macrium Valued Partner.

Among the tools you might find useful are:

  • Your order history and information about upcoming renewals
  • News and current promotions available in your region
  • Sales and marketing tools
  • Partner Deal Registration
  • Generate your MVP NFR keys
  • Pricing and distribution information

Please contact us in case of any feedback or inquiries.

Pricing

Here you can find the pricing for all our products:

  • Workstation Products - price per license (perpetual license)
  • Server Products - price per license (perpetual license)
  • Technician Products - price per subscription (1 year)
  • CMC License Bundles - for use with Central Management Console
  • Support - price per subscription (1 year)

Follow the link below to view all our prices.

Click Here to View the Pricing

Resources

The right positioning and promotion of the products to the end-customers are very important. So we are here to help! On this page we will be collecting and sharing our marketing tools

  • Data Sheets
  • Email Templates
  • Copy blocks for website and social media
  • Logo
